title: Migration Wizard UX Improvements
description:
The Migration Wizard launched after Employee Central login needs UX improvements:

1. **Add Skip Button** - Users should be able to skip the Migration Wizard and proceed directly to their destination

2. **Conditional Launch** - Migration Wizard should NOT launch when logging in via Employee Central (platform=aeims). It should only launch for migration-specific login flows.
acceptance_criteria: Skip button visible on Migration Wizard
Clicking Skip redirects to intended destination
Employee Central logins (platform=aeims) bypass Migration Wizard entirely
Migration Wizard only appears for explicit migration flows
testing_plan:
1. Login via Employee Central - verify no Migration Wizard
2. Login with migration returnUrl - verify Migration Wizard appears
3. Click Skip on Migration Wizard - verify redirect to destination
4. Complete Migration Wizard - verify normal flow works
rollback_plan: Revert login-sso deployment to v1.2.6 if issues occur

comments.author: claude@afterdarksys.com
comments.text: Ticket created from user feedback. Ryan confirmed logins are working but Migration Wizard UX needs improvement.
